Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: invocation of `SendSubmit` in orderer cluster rpc should be serialized
Issue.description: gRPC is not thread-safe, however {{Submit}} is potentially accessed in parallel|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/068b0e96ec94342e30ac02ba38b8072f14bdde89/orderer/consensus/etcdraft/chain.go#L305 . Therefore, we should have a mutex to protect the access, until it's done within RPC
